fileSamples.statement: length (l1 ++ [y] ++ l2 ++ [x]) = length (l1 ++ [x] ++ l2 ++ [y]).
length (l1 ++ [x] ++ l2 ++ [y]) = length l1 + 1 + length l2 + 1.
(n : nat) (d : A) (LT : n < length l1) : nth n (l1 ++ [y] ++ l2 ++ [x]) d = nth n (l1 ++ [x] ++ l2 ++ [y]) d.
(d : A) : nth (length l1) (l1 ++ [y] ++ l2 ++ [x]) d = y.
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite app_nth2 by lia.
now rewrite PeanoNat.Nat.sub_diag.

fileSamples.statement: (d : A) : nth (length l1 - length l1) ([y] ++ l2 ++ [x]) d = y.

ls A (l1 ++ [x] ++ l2 ++ [y]) (l1 ++ [y] ++ l2 ++ [x]) 
  (length l1) (length l1 + 1 + length l2).
(x l2 : list A) (x0 y : A) (STRUCT : lsc A a b x l2 x0 y) : ls A b a (length x) (length x + 1 + length l2).
(x l2 : list A) (x0 y : A) (STRUCT : lsc A a b x l2 x0 y) : length b = length a.
(x l2 : list A) (x0 y : A) (STRUCT : lsc A a b x l2 x0 y) : length a = length x + 1 + length l2 + 1.
(x l2 : list A) (x0 y : A) (STRUCT : lsc A a b x l2 x0 y) : length x < length x + 1 + length l2.
(x l2 : list A) (N : nat) (d : A) (LT : N < length x) (x0 y : A) (STRUCT : lsc A a b x l2 x0 y) : nth N b d = nth N a d.
(x l2 : list A) (N : nat) (d : A) (LT : length x < N) (LT' : N < length x + 1 + length l2) (x0 y : A) (STRUCT : lsc A a b x l2 x0 y) : nth N b d = nth N a d.
(x l2 : list A) (d x0 y : A) (STRUCT : lsc A a b x l2 x0 y) : nth (length x + 1 + length l2) b d = nth (length x) a d.
fileSamples.proofString: now erewrite lsc_nth_x, lsc_nth_y by eauto with listswap.

fileSamples.statement: (x l2 : list A) (d x0 y : A) (STRUCT : lsc A a b x l2 x0 y) : nth (length x) b d = nth (length x + 1 + length l2) a d.
fileSamples.proofString: now erewrite lsc_nth_x, lsc_nth_y by eauto with listswap.

fileSamples.statement: (x l2 : list A) (N : nat) (d : A) (NEQ1 : N <> length x) (NEQ2 : N <> length x + 1 + length l2) (x0 y : A) (STRUCT : lsc A a b x l2 x0 y) : nth N b d = nth N a d.
(x l2 : list A) (x0 y : A) (STRUCT : lsc A a b x l2 x0 y) (L1_LEN : length x = m) (L2_LEN : length x + 1 + length l2 = n) : (fun x1 : A => In x1 a) ≡₁ (fun x1 : A => In x1 b).

(l : list A) (rest : trace A) (l' : list A) (SWAP : ListSwap.ls A l l' m n) : trace_swapped A (trace_app (trace_fin l') rest)
  (trace_app (trace_fin l) rest) m n.
fileSamples.proofString:
exists l', l, rest.
splits; eauto with listswap.

fileSamples.statement:
(x : list A) (rest : trace A) (l' : list A) (SWAP : ListSwap.ls A x l' m n) : trace_length (trace_app (trace_fin l') rest) =
trace_length (trace_app (trace_fin x) rest).
fileSamples.proofString:
destruct rest; ins.
autorewrite with calc_length.
do 2 f_equal.
eauto with listswap.

fileSamples.statement: (x l l' : list A) (SWAP : ListSwap.ls A x l' m n) : NOnum (length (l' ++ l)) = NOnum (length (x ++ l)).
fileSamples.proofString:
autorewrite with calc_length.
do 2 f_equal.
eauto with listswap.

fileSamples.statement: (x l l' : list A) (SWAP : ListSwap.ls A x l' m n) : NOnum (length l' + length l) = NOnum (length x + length l).
(x l l' : list A) (SWAP : ListSwap.ls A x l' m n) : length l' = length x.
(x : list A) (rest : trace A) (l' : list A) (SWAP : ListSwap.ls A x l' m n) : m < n.
(x : list A) (rest : trace A) (l' : list A) (SWAP : ListSwap.ls A x l' m n) : NOmega.lt_nat_l n (trace_length (trace_app (trace_fin x) rest)).
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite trace_length_app.
destruct (trace_length rest); ins.
eauto using PeanoNat.Nat.lt_lt_add_r with listswap.

fileSamples.statement:
(x : list A) (rest : trace A) (l' : list A) (SWAP : ListSwap.ls A x l' m n) : NOmega.lt_nat_l n
  (NOmega.add (trace_length (trace_fin x)) (trace_length rest)).
fileSamples.proofString:
destruct (trace_length rest); ins.
eauto using PeanoNat.Nat.lt_lt_add_r with listswap.

fileSamples.statement: (x : list A) (rest : trace A) (l' : list A) (SWAP : ListSwap.ls A x l' m n) (n0 : nat) : n < length x + n0.

(a : list A) (b : trace A) (p : nat) (d : A) (LT : length a <= p) : (ifP NOmega.lt_nat_l p (trace_length (trace_fin a))
 then trace_nth p (trace_fin a) d
 else trace_nth (NOmega.sub_nat_l p (trace_length (trace_fin a))) b d) =
trace_nth (p - length a) b d.
(a : list A) (b : trace A) (p : nat) (d : A) (LT : length a <= p) (l : NOmega.lt_nat_l p (trace_length (trace_fin a))) : trace_nth p (trace_fin a) d = trace_nth (p - length a) b d.
(a : list A) (b : trace A) (p : nat) (d : A) (LT : length a <= p) (l : p < length a) : nth p a d = trace_nth (p - length a) b d.
(d : A) (LT' : m < n) : trace_nth n t' d = trace_nth m t d.
fileSamples.proofString:
destruct SWAPPED; desf.
rewrite !trace_nth_app1; simpl; eauto with listswap.
erewrite ListSwap.ls_len; eauto with listswap; lia.

fileSamples.statement:
(x : list A) (rest : trace A) (l' : list A) (d : A) (LT' : m < n) (SWAP : ListSwap.ls A x l' m n) : trace_nth n (trace_app (trace_fin l') rest) d =
trace_nth m (trace_app (trace_fin x) rest) d.
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite !trace_nth_app1; simpl; eauto with listswap.
erewrite ListSwap.ls_len; eauto with listswap; lia.

fileSamples.statement: (x : list A) (rest : trace A) (l' : list A) (d : A) (LT' : m < n) (SWAP : ListSwap.ls A x l' m n) : m < length x.
fileSamples.proofString: erewrite ListSwap.ls_len; eauto with listswap; lia.

fileSamples.statement: (d : A) (LT' : m < n) : trace_nth m t' d = trace_nth n t d.
fileSamples.proofString:
destruct SWAPPED; desf.
rewrite !trace_nth_app1; simpl; eauto with listswap.
erewrite ListSwap.ls_len; eauto with listswap; lia.

fileSamples.statement:
(x : list A) (rest : trace A) (l' : list A) (d : A) (LT' : m < n) (SWAP : ListSwap.ls A x l' m n) : trace_nth m (trace_app (trace_fin l') rest) d =
trace_nth n (trace_app (trace_fin x) rest) d.
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite !trace_nth_app1; simpl; eauto with listswap.
erewrite ListSwap.ls_len; eauto with listswap; lia.

fileSamples.statement: (x : list A) (rest : trace A) (l' : list A) (d : A) (LT' : m < n) (SWAP : ListSwap.ls A x l' m n) : m < length l'.
fileSamples.proofString: erewrite ListSwap.ls_len; eauto with listswap; lia.

fileSamples.statement:
(x : list A) (rest : trace A) (l' : list A) (SWAP : ListSwap.ls A x l' m n) : trace_elems (trace_app (trace_fin x) rest)
≡₁ trace_elems (trace_app (trace_fin l') rest).
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite !trace_elems_app.
simpl.
rewrite ListSwap.ls_in by eauto.
unfold trace_finite; desf; exfalso; eauto.

fileSamples.statement:
(x : list A) (rest : trace A) (l' : list A) (SWAP : ListSwap.ls A x l' m n) : trace_elems (trace_fin x)
∪₁ (ifP trace_finite (trace_fin x) then trace_elems rest else ∅)
≡₁ trace_elems (trace_fin l')
   ∪₁ (ifP trace_finite (trace_fin l') then trace_elems rest else ∅).
fileSamples.proofString:
simpl.
rewrite ListSwap.ls_in by eauto.
unfold trace_finite; desf; exfalso; eauto.

fileSamples.statement:
(x : list A) (rest : trace A) (l' : list A) (SWAP : ListSwap.ls A x l' m n) : (fun a : A => In a x)
∪₁ (ifP trace_finite (trace_fin x) then trace_elems rest else ∅)
≡₁ (fun a : A => In a l')
   ∪₁ (ifP trace_finite (trace_fin l') then trace_elems rest else ∅).
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite ListSwap.ls_in by eauto.
unfold trace_finite; desf; exfalso; eauto.

fileSamples.statement:
(x : list A) (rest : trace A) (l' : list A) (SWAP : ListSwap.ls A x l' m n) : (fun x0 : A => In x0 l')
∪₁ (ifP trace_finite (trace_fin x) then trace_elems rest else ∅)
≡₁ (fun a : A => In a l')
   ∪₁ (ifP trace_finite (trace_fin l') then trace_elems rest else ∅).
